      public org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Insets getOverviewInsets()
      Description copied from interface: ITimelineStyleProvider
      Get the insets for the overview area. These insets will be applied within the border acquired from ITimelineStyleProvider.getOverviewAreaBorder(). The top inset will also be used for lane spacing.
      Specified by:
      getOverviewInsets in interface ITimelineStyleProvider
      Returns:
